nodes.documentation:
Join the XBR Network. All XBR stakeholders, namely XBR Data Providers,
XBR Data Consumers, XBR Data Markets and XBR Data Clouds, must register
with the XBR Network on the global blockchain by calling this function.
     * @param eula The IPFS Multihash of the XBR EULA being agreed to and stored as one ZIP file archive on IPFS.
            Currently, this must be equal to "QmU7Gizbre17x6V2VR1Q2GJEjz6m8S1bXmBtVxS2vmvb81"
@param profile Optional public member profile: the IPFS Multihash of the member profile stored in IPFS.
nodes.name: register

nodes.documentation: Leave the XBR Network.
nodes.name: unregister
getMemberLevel
getMemberEula
getMemberProfile

nodes.documentation:
Manually override the member level of a XBR Network member. Being able to do so
currently serves two purposes:
     * - having a last resort to handle situation where members violated the EULA
- being able to manually patch things in error/bug cases
     * @param member The address of the XBR network member to override member level.
@param level The member level to set the member to.
nodes.name: setMemberLevel
createDomain

nodes.documentation:
Close an existing XBR domain. The sender must be owner of the domain, and the domain
must not have any nodes paired (anymore).
     * @param domainId The ID of the domain to close.
nodes.name: closeDomain
getDomainStatus
getDomainOwner
getDomainKey
getDomainLicense
getDomainTerms
getDomainMeta
pairNode

nodes.documentation:
Release a node currently paired with an XBR domain. The sender must be owner of the domain.
     * @param nodeId The ID of the node to release.
nodes.name: releaseNode
getNodeByKey
getNodeDomain
getNodeType
getNodeKey
getNodeConfig
createMarket
getMarketByMaker
getMarketOwner
getMarketTerms
getMarketMeta
getMarketMaker
getMarketProviderSecurity
getMarketConsumerSecurity
getMarketFee
updateMarket

nodes.documentation:
Close a market. A closed market will not accept new memberships.
     * @param marketId The ID of the market to close.
nodes.name: closeMarket
joinMarket
getAllMarketActors
getMarketActorType
getMarketActorSecurity

nodes.documentation:
As a market actor (participant) currently member of a market, leave that market.
A market can only be left when all payment channels of the sender are closed (or expired).
     * @param marketId The ID of the market to leave.
nodes.name: leaveMarket
openPaymentChannel
getAllMarketPaymentChannels

nodes.documentation:
As a data provider, request a new payment channel to get paid by the market maker. Given sufficient
security amount (deposited by the data provider when joining the marker) to cover the request amount,
the market maker will open a payment (state) channel to allow the market maker buying data keys in
microtransactions, and offchain. The creation of the payment channel is asynchronously: the market maker
is watching the global blockchain filtering for events relevant to the market managed by the maker.
When a request to open a payment channel is recognized by the market maker, it will check the provider
for sufficient security deposit covering the requested amount, and if all is fine, create a new payment
channel and store the contract address for the channel request ID, so the data provider can retrieve it.
     * @param marketId The ID of the market to request a paying channel within.
nodes.name: requestPayingChannel

nodes.documentation:
As a data provider, request a new payment channel to get paid by the market maker. Given sufficient
security amount (deposited by the data provider when joining the marker) to cover the request amount,
the market maker will open a payment (state) channel to allow the market maker buying data keys in
microtransactions, and offchain. The creation of the payment channel is asynchronously: the market maker
is watching the global blockchain filtering for events relevant to the market managed by the maker.
When a request to open a payment channel is recognized by the market maker, it will check the provider
for sufficient security deposit covering the requested amount, and if all is fine, create a new payment
channel and store the contract address for the channel request ID, so the data provider can retrieve it.
     * @param marketId The ID of the market to request a paying channel within.
nodes.name: requestPayingChannel

params.account: The account to grant maintainer rights to.

params.domainId: The ID of the domain to close.

params.marketId: The ID of the market to close.

params.organization_: The network technology provider and ecosystem sponsor.
params.token_: The token to run this network on.

params.domainId: The ID of the domain to create. Must be globally unique (not yet existing).
params.domainKey: The domain signing key. A Ed25519 (https://ed25519.cr.yp.to/) public key.
params.license: The license for the software stack running the domain. IPFS Multihash                pointing to a JSON/YAML file signed by the project release key.

params.consumerSecurity: The amount of XBR tokens a XBR consumer joining the market must deposit.
params.maker: The address of the XBR market maker that will run this market. The delegate of the market owner.
params.marketFee: The fee taken by the market (beneficiary is the market owner). The fee is a percentage of                 the revenue of the XBR Provider that receives XBR Token paid for transactions.                 The fee must be between 0% (inclusive) and 99% (inclusive), and is expressed as                 a fraction of the total supply of XBR tokens.
params.marketId: The ID of the market to create. Must be unique (not yet existing).
params.meta: The XBR market metadata published by the market owner. IPFS Multihash pointing            to a RDF/Turtle file with market metadata.
params.providerSecurity: The amount of XBR tokens a XBR provider joining the market must deposit.
params.terms: The XBR market terms set by the market owner. IPFS Multihash pointing             to a ZIP archive file with market documents.

params.marketId: The ID of the market to lookup actors.

getAllMarketActors(bytes16).return: List of addresses of market actors in the market.

params.marketId: The XBR Market to get payment channels for.

getAllMarketPaymentChannels(bytes16).return: List of contract addresses of payment channels in the market.

params.domainId: The ID of the domain to lookup key.

getDomainKey(bytes16).return: The Ed25519 public signing key for the domain.

params.domainId: The ID of the domain to lookup license.

getDomainLicense(bytes16).return: IPFS Multihash pointer to domain license file on IPFS.

params.domainId: The ID of the domain to lookup meta data.

getDomainMeta(bytes16).return: IPFS Multihash pointer to domain metadata file on IPFS.

params.domainId: The ID of the domain to lookup owner.

getDomainOwner(bytes16).return: The address of the owner of the domain.

params.domainId: The ID of the domain to lookup status.

getDomainStatus(bytes16).return: The current status of the domain.

params.domainId: The ID of the domain to lookup terms.

getDomainTerms(bytes16).return: IPFS Multihash pointer to domain terms on IPFS.

params.actor: The address of the actor to lookup.
params.marketId: The ID of the market to lookup actor type.

getMarketActorSecurity(bytes16,address).return: The security deposit of the actor in the given market.

params.actor: The address of the actor to lookup.
params.marketId: The ID of the market to lookup actor type.

getMarketActorType(bytes16,address).return: The type under which the actor is joined in the market.

params.maker: The market maker address to lookup market for

params.marketId: The ID of the market to lookup consumer security for.

getMarketConsumerSecurity(bytes16).return: The consumer security defined in the market.

params.marketId: The ID of the market to lookup market fee for.

getMarketFee(bytes16).return: The fee defined in the market.

params.marketId: The ID of the market to lookup the market maker address for.

getMarketMaker(bytes16).return: The address of the (offchain) market maker delegate responsible for this market.

params.marketId: The ID of the market to lookup metadata for.

getMarketMeta(bytes16).return: IPFS Multihash pointer to market metadata.

params.marketId: The ID of the market to lookup owner for.

getMarketOwner(bytes16).return: Address of the owner of the market.

params.marketId: The ID of the market to lookup provider security for.

getMarketProviderSecurity(bytes16).return: The provider security defined in the market.

params.marketId: The ID of the market to lookup terms for.

getMarketTerms(bytes16).return: IPFS Multihash pointer to market terms.

params.member: The address to lookup the XBR Network member EULA for.

getMemberEula(address).return: IPFS Multihash pointing to XBR Network EULA file on IPFS.

params.member: The address to lookup the XBR Network member level for.

getMemberLevel(address).return: The current member level of the member.

params.member: The address to lookup the XBR Network member profile for.

getMemberProfile(address).return: IPFS Multihash pointing to member profile file on IPFS.

params.nodeKey: The node public key to lookup

getNodeByKey(bytes32).return: The Ed25519 public key of the node.

params.nodeId: The ID of the node to lookup the config for.

getNodeConfig(bytes16).return: IPFS Multihash pointer to node config.

params.nodeId: The ID of the node to lookup the domain for.

getNodeDomain(bytes16).return: The domain the node is currently paired with.

params.nodeId: The ID of the node to lookup the node public key for.
The ID of the node to lookup the node type for.

isMaintainer(address).return: `true` if the account is maintainer, otherwise `false`.

params.actorType: The type of actor under which to join: PROVIDER or CONSUMER.
params.marketId: The ID of the XBR data market to join.
The ID of the market to leave.

params.amount: Amount of XBR Token to deposit into the payment channel.
params.consumer: The address of the (offchain) consumer delegate allowed to consumer the channel.
params.marketId: The ID of the market to open a payment channel within.

params.config: Optional IPFS Multihash pointing to node configuration stored on IPFS
params.domainId: The ID of the domain to pair the node with.
params.nodeId: The ID of the node to pair. Must be globally unique (not yet existing).
params.nodeType: The type of node to pair the node under.

params.eula: The IPFS Multihash of the XBR EULA being agreed to and stored as one ZIP file archive on IPFS.            Currently, this must be equal to "QmU7Gizbre17x6V2VR1Q2GJEjz6m8S1bXmBtVxS2vmvb81"
params.profile: Optional public member profile: the IPFS Multihash of the member profile stored in IPFS.

params.nodeId: The ID of the node to release.

params.marketId: The ID of the market to request a paying channel within.

params.level: The member level to set the member to.
params.member: The address of the XBR network member to override member level.

params.consumerSecurity: Consumer security to set that will apply for new members (consumers) joining                        the market. It will NOT apply to current market members.
params.maker: When maker should be updated, provide a non-zero address.
params.marketFee: New market fee to set. The new market fee will apply to all new payment channels                 opened. It will NOT apply to already opened (or closed) payment channels.
params.marketId: The ID of the market to update.
params.meta: When metadata should be updated, provide a string of non-zero length with            an IPFS Multihash pointing to the new RDF/Turtle file with market metadata.
params.providerSecurity: Provider security to set that will apply for new members (providers) joining                        the market. It will NOT apply to current market members.
params.terms: When terms should be updated, provide a string of non-zero length with             an IPFS Multihash pointing to the new ZIP file with market terms.

updateMarket(bytes16,string,string,addre.return: Flag indicating weather the market information was actually updated or left unchanged.

addMaintainer(address).notice: Add a new maintainer to the list of maintainers.

closeDomain(bytes16).notice: Close an existing XBR domain. The sender must be owner of the domain, and the domain must not have any nodes paired (anymore).

closeMarket(bytes16).notice: Close a market. A closed market will not accept new memberships.

createDomain(bytes16,bytes32,string,stri.notice: Create a new XBR domain. Then sender to the transaction must be XBR network member and automatically becomes owner of the new domain.

createMarket(bytes16,string,string,addre.notice: Create a new XBR market. The sender of the transaction must be XBR network member and automatically becomes owner of the new market.

getAllMarketActors(bytes16).notice: Returns all actors in a given market.

getAllMarketPaymentChannels(bytes16).notice: Lookup all payment channels for a XBR Market.

getMarketActorSecurity(bytes16,address).notice: Returns the current security deposit of an actor within a market.

getMarketActorType(bytes16,address).notice: Returns the type of an actor within a market.

getMarketByMaker(address).notice: Lookup market ID by market maker address.

getMarketConsumerSecurity(bytes16).notice: Returns consumer security for a market.

getMarketFee(bytes16).notice: Returns market fee for a market.

getMarketMaker(bytes16).notice: Returns market maker for a market.

getMarketProviderSecurity(bytes16).notice: Returns provider security for a market.

getMemberEula(address).notice: Returns XBR Network member EULA given an address.

getMemberLevel(address).notice: Returns XBR Network member level given an address.

getMemberProfile(address).notice: Returns XBR Network member profile given an address.

getNodeByKey(bytes32).notice: Lookup node ID by node public key.

getNodeKey(bytes16).notice: Returns node public key for a node.

getNodeType(bytes16).notice: Returns node type for a node.

isMaintainer(address).notice: Check if the given address is currently a maintainer.

joinMarket(bytes16,uint8).notice: Join the given XBR market as the specified type of actor, which must be PROVIDER or CONSUMER.

leaveMarket(bytes16).notice: As a market actor (participant) currently member of a market, leave that market. A market can only be left when all payment channels of the sender are closed (or expired).

openPaymentChannel(bytes16,address,uint2.notice: Open a new payment channel and deposit an amount of XBR token into a market.

pairNode(bytes16,bytes16,uint8,bytes32,s.notice: Pair a node with an existing XBR Domain. The sender must be owner of the domain.

register(string,string).notice: Join the XBR Network. All XBR stakeholders, namely XBR Data Providers, XBR Data Consumers, XBR Data Markets and XBR Data Clouds, must register with the XBR Network on the global blockchain by calling this function.

releaseNode(bytes16).notice: Release a node currently paired with an XBR domain. The sender must be owner of the domain.

requestPayingChannel(bytes16,address,uin.notice: As a data provider, request a new payment channel to get paid by the market maker. Given sufficient security amount (deposited by the data provider when joining the marker) to cover the request amount, the market maker will open a payment (state) channel to allow the market maker buying data keys in microtransactions, and offchain. The creation of the payment channel is asynchronously: the market maker is watching the global blockchain filtering for events relevant to the market managed by the maker. When a request to open a payment channel is recognized by the market maker, it will check the provider for sufficient security deposit covering the requested amount, and if all is fine, create a new payment channel and store the contract address for the channel request ID, so the data provider can retrieve it.

setMemberLevel(address,uint8).notice: Manually override the member level of a XBR Network member. Being able to do so currently serves two purposes:     * - having a last resort to handle situation where members violated the EULA - being able to manually patch things in error/bug cases

updateMarket(bytes16,string,string,addre.notice: Update market information, like market terms, metadata or maker address.
